texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over Christmas and New Year, most of the TfL network is open. However, there are some changes and planned works that may affect your journey."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
There are changes and planned works on the following services today. All our other services are running normally.
See our Status updates map for Saturday 29 December for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Overground"}
There are changes to services today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["A Saturday service is running:ul","No service between South Tottenham and Barking","No service between Romford and Upminster","No service between Edmonton Green and Cheshunt","No service between Surrey Quays and Clapham Junction","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Chingford (trains run about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Hackney Downs and Clapton)","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Edmonton Green / Enfield Town (trains run about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Cambridge Heath, London Fields and Hackney Downs)","Use replacement or local bus services - see \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-29T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-29T23%3a59%3a59\"\u003eStatus updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @LDNOverground for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"TfL Rail"}
There are changes to services today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Liverpool Street and Romford","Reduced service between Romford and Shenfield (trains run about every 15 minutes)","Reduced service between Paddington and Hayes \u0026 Harlington (trains run about every 30 minutes, not stopping at Acton Main Line, West Ealing or Hanwell","Use replacement or local bus services - see \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-29T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-29T23%3a59%3a59#line-tfl-rail\"\u003eStatus updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLRail for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Cycling"}
Some Santander Cycles docking stations will be out of use at times in preparation for the New Year's Eve celebrations
To find a docking station:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["visit \u003ca href=\"/modes/cycling/santander-cycles/find-a-docking-station\"\u003etfl.gov.uk/modes/cycling/santander-cycles/find-a-docking-station\u003c/a\u003e ","use the free Santander Cycles app - download it from the \u003ca href=\"https://www.apple.com/uk/ios/app-store/\"\u003eApp Store\u003c/a\u003e or \u003ca href=\"https://play.google.com/store?hl=en_GB\"\u003eGoogle Play\u003c/a\u003e "]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Driving"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No access to Upper Street southbound from Highbury Corner from 04:00. A signed diversion will be in place. \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/highbury-corner-roundabout\"\u003eFind out more\u003c/a\u003e ","The Congestion Charge and T-Charge do not apply today","See our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future%20date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-29T00%3A00%3A00\u0026endDate=2018-12-29\"\u003etraffic status updates map for 29 December\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLTrafficNews on Twitter.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"National Rail"}
Check National Rail's Christmas page for information about service changes and planned works over the festive season.
